Key Match Events: Matt Wallner hit a 435-foot home run to center field.
Willi Castro broke his 0-15 streak with a game-tying hit.
Brooks Lee broke his 0-19 streak with a double, plating two runs.
Jordyn Adams hit a home run off Jorge Alcalá.
Royce Lewis hit a two-run double after initially being called a grand slam.
Jhoan Durán secured the save despite allowing two singles and a run.
Pre-Game Insights: The Twins approached the game with playoff-like urgency and strategy.
Post-Match Reflections: Griffin Jax had an emotional night with his family involved in the pre-game flyover.
The Twins celebrated two wins in a row and aimed to move up in the Wild Card standings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game featured a flyover by military aircraft, with Griffin Jax's brother and sister-in-law as pilots.
The Twins Daily's game recap was sponsored by Official Fried Chicken.
